name: Limping Spider
description:
Welcome here! This world is very loony and unique!
Limping spider needs your help! Precious web is under attack! Are you ready for action? Become a brave spider!

GAME FEATURES:
* A simple and addictive game for all ages!
* Many levels and speed! Progressive difficulty!
* Unlimited action and randomly generated enemies! Different every time you play!
* Easy to play: Click/Touch your screen! 
* Test your reflexes! It's easy and fun to play yet challenging to master!
* Super-fast action! It only takes 3-10 minutes per game. Perfect to fill a short break between your other activities. You will have enough time to play this game even if you do not have time to play other games at all!
* Limping Spider is optimised for Android tablets/phones, Windows and Linux!
* Sweet and unique graphics and sound 8-)
* A light, small game that won’t take space on your device. Only 10 seconds from launching the game to playing it!
* Play anytime and anywhere! The game works without the internet!

HOW TO PLAY:
* Tap/Click screen where you want to move your limping spider!
* Try to catch as many insects as possible!
* Protect your web from damage!
* Hold your nerve!
* Survive!
* Most important- HAVE FUN!!!

WARNING!!! HIGHLY ADDICTIVE! Once you start playing, you can't put it away!

** No hidden costs and no additional purchases! This game is 100% complete and 100% yours forever!
** What are you waiting for? Warm-up your fingers and start playing!!!
Good luck!!!
